description: Create column isbnValid at index 24 based on column isbn using expression grel:if(or(row.index-row.record.fromRowIndex!=0,isBlank(cells["020 "].value.match(/(.*)(\$a)([^\$]*)(.*)/)[2])),null,if(isNonBlank(cells["isbn"].value),true,false))

Create column isbnOd1989 at index 25 based on column rok using expression grel:if(or(isBlank(cells["format"].value.match(/.*(BOOKS).*/)[0]),cells["rok"].value < 1989),null,if(and(isNonBlank(cells["format"].value.match(/.*(BOOKS).*/)[0]),isNonBlank(cells["isbn"].value)),true,false))
Create column title16plus at index 26 based on column title using expression grel:cells["title"].value.length() >= 16

Create column titleNum at index 27 based on column title using expression grel:if(and(isNonBlank(cells["format"].value.match(/.*(BOOKS|PERIODICALS|ARTICLES).*/)[0]),isNonBlank(cells["title"].value.match(/.+\D+(\d+)$/)[0])),true,null)
Create column titleYearFilter at index 28 based on column title using expression grel:or(isNonBlank(cells["015 "].value),cells["title"].value.length()>=16,cells["rok"].value>=1989)
